name: Pringle AF1408 Manual Air Fryer 3.2L For Home With Timer Control Fry, Bake, Roast, Toast, Defrost, Grill, 360° High Speed Air Circulation Technology 1250 W with Non-Stick 3.2 L Basket- Black
product_desc: Oil-Free Fryer: Fryer with Air Crisp Technology that with hot air at high speed and constant temperature fries with little or no oil and achieves much healthier frying, with less than 99% fat and a crispy and tasty result.
Ease of Operation: With constant temperature setting at 180 degrees, set time between 1 and 60 minutes, depending on the food item and quantity.

Not just fries, now make aloo tikkas, roast chicken, grilled vegetables, chocolate cakes, muffins, frozen potatoes, natural potatoes, all kinds of vegetables, chicken, sausages, meat, fish, cakes and much more.
very easy to use. Set time between 1 and 60 minutes and the temperature between 80ºC and 200ºC. It has a buzzer at the end of cooking, cold touch handle and non-slip feet
Non-Stick Cooking Pan: 3.2 L Food Pan is Non-Stick that will allow food to be brown without sticking to the pan. It has 1250W of power that ensures fast and homogeneous cooking.
Suitable for gifting on Diwali and other special occasions.

360° Air circulation Technology helps to ensure that the food receives consistent heat from all angles, resulting in uniform cooking and a crispy texture on all sides. During cooking, the air fryer's fan will circulate the hot air around the food, cooking it from all angles.

name: Konquer TimeS Hand Mixer, Electric Hand Whisk, Electric Hand Mixers, Small Stainless Steel Handheld Mixer, 2 Mixers and 2 Dough Hooks Electric Hand Mixers for Kitchen Beating Eggs, Cakes - 260W
product_desc: 【SAFE AND CONVENIENT】Ergonomic design-made of ultra-high-strength stainless steel makes the operation comfortable and convenient. All the dishwasher attachments are safe. Durable stainless steel dough hooks make it easy to mix the dough and heavier cakes. No noise, no smoke, safer. The stainless steel mixer is perfect for mixing egg whites, cream toppings, and light cake mixes or batters.

【EASY TO USE & CLEAN】Upgrade electric hand mixer is an ideal assistant for making desserts, cakes, and other baked goods. Modern control systems provide you with more flexible and convenient baking methods. Our lightweight electric hand mixers are not easy leakage so they are safe for easy cleaning. The perfect shape design is easy to wipe, which greatly saves cleaning time.

【STRENGTH AND DURABILIRY】The exterior of the handheld electric mixers are made of lightweight stainless steel, which is scratch-resistant. The included stainless steel stirrer and kneader are non-degradable to improve durability and strength. The heat dissipation port design minimizes heat, prevents the motor from being burned out, and extends the service life.

【ONE BUTTON】: Kitchen handheld electric blender conveniently operates with one hand. Just press a button to adjust 7 speeds. IT HAS4 speed with 7 combination, Cord length is - 1M

name: Pigeon Healthifry Digital Air Fryer, 360° High Speed Air Circulation Technology 1200 W with Non-Stick 4.2 L Basket - Green
product_desc: Only Air Fryer with Appointment Function used to make fried foods such as meat, pastries, and potato chips.
AIR FRYER CAPACITY: 4.2 litre capacity is enough to enjoy your favorite French fries, samosas, and nuggets without having to worry

HEALTHIER FRIED FOOD: Pigeon Healthifry Digital Air Fryer is a tool that is used to cook food with 85% less oil which means with only one spoon of oil, you can cook your favorite food items. 360° HIGH SPEED AIR CIRCULARION TECHNOLOGY: Air fryers work by circulating hot air around a food item to create the same crispiness as traditional fried foods.
POWERFUL 1200 Watts: It heats up very quickly, cook food evenly and swiftly due to the combined presence of a concentrated heat source and the size and placement of the fan.
NON-STICK FOOD BASKET: 4.2 L Food Basket is Non-Stick that will allow food to be brown without sticking to the pan.
